user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill my need for comfortable, high-quality clothing that is versatile and suitable for everyday wear, with features that enhance usability and longevity.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a t-shirt that not only provided comfort but also had features like odour protection and moisture-wicking capabilities. The promise of keeping me cool and dry was a significant factor in my decision, as I often engage in activities where these features are essential. The high rating and positive reviews also influenced my choice, as they indicated a level of satisfaction from other customers.

I wanted a versatile long-sleeve tee made from soft, breathable cotton that I could wear frequently. The preshrunk fabric was appealing because it promised durability and ease of care. The variety of colors available also played a role in my decision, allowing me to choose something that matched my style. The high rating reassured me of its quality.

I was in search of affordable yet high-quality everyday clothing. The emphasis on comfort and consistent sizing was important to me, as I wanted to avoid the hassle of returns due to sizing issues. The positive feedback from other customers about the product's quality and comfort further solidified my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer good value for money, comfort, and practicality. I appreciate items that are well-made, durable, and provide a flattering fit, especially in clothing. Features like moisture-wicking fabric, wrinkle resistance, and easy care are important to me. I also value products that are versatile enough for both casual and work settings. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that are uncomfortable, poorly fitting, or made from harsh materials. I have a particular aversion to products that lack support or are not suitable for everyday wear, especially in the case of undergarments.
